chapter.title: Report Execution Module
chapter.para: This module enables you as a user at a bank to execute reports designed by an authorized administrator at your bank.
When you click Report Execution, you are presented with a list of all reports available for execution. You can search the list by enteringa value in the Report Name field at the top of the page.
The list of available reports displays the Report Name and the Report Description.
Click in the Report Name column to run a report.

The report produced may itself have search fields and a Search button at the top of the page so you can search for particular sets of entries. You can also select the output format: Screen, CSV, SpreadSheet (Excel) or SpreadSheet.
